tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wallet_aliases (
  alias_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  wallet_address TEXT UNIQUE,
  alias_label TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_wallet_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_wallet_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender_address VARCHAR(100),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(100),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    sender_id UUID REFERENCES wallet_addresses(id),
    receiver_id UUID REFERENCES wallet_addresses(id)
);
